text: House Party 2 is a 1991 American comedy movie. This movie is about a pajama party. Queen Latifah plays Zora. Martin Lawrence plays Bilal. Tisha Campbell is also in the movie. The movie got negative reviews from critics. It started at #1 at the box office. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:1990s sequel movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American independent movies
title: House Party 2
